reviews.text: Food is absolutely amazing! The place is small but once you taste the food, the space issue is forgotten instantly. Food is authentic and the staff is friendly and welcoming! I always come out with a smile from Karma Kate 😊

It truly is the best Indian, or dinner in general, spot in Hoboken. I’ve been to many Indian restaurants and this tops it all. Kind staff, AMAZING food, and free starter app. And the portion is very generous so had to pack some for tomorrow lunch. The space is small and might need to wait a bit. Will be back many many times.

FIRST INDIAN PLACE I'VE BEEN TO. That being said it was pretty good. Chicken curry was better than most with a lot of flavor and a bit of spice (manageable for all). Garlic Naan bread was amazing. Will come back just for that if nothing else. Easily a nice place to bring for a casual date.
Good food with a wide selection during the buffet time. A La Carte menu is equally good. Place is a bit small but once you are seated you will be happy with the food.
Excellent food! Great atmosphere! The Karma Naan is like Indian pizza and it the absolutely amazing! They validate your parking ticket if you park at the municipal parking lot at 215 Hudson St!
